title: Danny Summerhill and Paola Munoz continue their hold on the American Criterium Cup headed into race number seven
content:
The series heads to the Lake Bluff Criterium, part of the Intelligentsia Cup.

Read the full article at Danny Summerhill and Paola Munoz continue their hold on the American Criterium Cup headed into race number seven on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
